card.name: Aggravated Assault
card.text: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Bitterblossom
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

card.name: Blood Moon
card.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

card.name: Copy Enchantment
card.text: You may have Copy Enchantment enter the battlefield as a copy of any enchantment on the battlefield.

card.name: Curiosity
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

card.name: Defense of the Heart
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Defense of the Heart
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Doubling Season
card.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

card.name: Doubling Season
card.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

card.name: Doubling Season
card.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

card.name: Fiery Emancipation
card.text: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals triple that damage to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Garruk's Uprising
card.text: When Garruk's Uprising enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card. Creatures you control have trample. (They can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker they're attacking.) Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

card.name: Grave Pact
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Grave Pact
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Greater Auramancy
card.text: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.

card.name: Griffin Aerie
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.

card.name: Kindred Discovery
card.text: As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.

card.name: Kindred Discovery
card.text: As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.

card.name: Land Tax
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Land Tax
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Land Tax

card.name: Leyline of the Void
card.text: If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Nature's Will
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.

card.name: Necropotence
card.text: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Necropotence
card.text: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Oppression
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards a card.

card.name: Polluted Bonds
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Polluted Bonds
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Prismatic Omen
card.text: Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.

card.name: Rhystic Study
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

card.name: Sanguine Bond
card.text: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

card.name: Smothering Tithe
card.text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Sneak Attack
card.text: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Spreading Seas
card.text: Enchant land When Spreading Seas enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted land is an Island.

card.name: Unnatural Growth
card.text: At the beginning of each combat, double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.
